title: Tatsuki Fujimoto 17-26
overview: Eight short stories written by Tatsuki Fujimoto, creator of "Chainsaw Man" and "Look Back," between the ages of 17 and 26, have been long-awaited to be animated by six studios and seven directors. From his first manga award-winning submission, "There Were Two Chickens in the Garden," to "Nayuta of the Prophecy" and "My Sister's Sister," these diverse stories depicting adolescent love, recklessness, madness, and bonds are now vividly brought to life.
